channel.title: Fantasy World v1.3 [317] oldschool --beginner tutorial--
channel.description:
U can check the development tread of v1.2 here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517647.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517647.0.html[/url]
Like said there, my biggest goal is the beginners tutorial. Whats a way more advanced now than it was before.
[i]Video about my beginners tutorial at the bottom.[/i]
[size=12pt][b]Still to do:[/b][/size] [b][size=10pt]- Getting out typos :p - Make that u dont get double items - fix bank booths - make combat instructor take the bones, (just forgot it when making the video) - fixing banker dialogue (i used the system now that when u talk banker for the 1st time u get 2 farming, so if u talk the banker again u have 2 farming and he sees that u have been there already. Should need to find a better system.) - Fix the real cooking range @ chief[/size][/b]
Im not an advanced coder, so Im done with the tutorial after the above is fixed.
[size=10pt][b]Big change[/b][/size] I transfered the things I already did to the iskape source. The source I was working in now was an old Delta source I found back on my computer and it was really messy and laggy and some more crap.
[b]What ive done more since v1.2:[/b] - Fixed some bugs and lil problems - Improved woodcutting - Added full cooking
[img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/5343/fishjz.jpg[/img]
- Made a bunch of dialogues and added bunch of npcs - Made some shops since there was none - worthless work since I changed to the iSkape source - edited wrong bonus of some items - same remark as above - added lots of npc drops - fixed a few client problems
[b]To do:[/b] Definitely fix magic and Still to much to write down
Runescape Beginners Tutorial: (my screen might have a bit an orange color, its because I use F.lux, a program that simulates the sun color on your screen of the time of the day, and it was getting night so yah, sunset color :p) [url=http://vimeo.com/29582091]http://vimeo.com/29582091[/url]
[b][size=14pt]Credits:[/size][/b] [size=12pt][b]Delta Me Iskape[/b][/size]

item.title: Fantasy World v1.3 [317] oldschool --beginner tutorial--
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

U can check the development tread of v1.2 here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517647.0.html

Like said there, my biggest goal is the beginners tutorial.
Whats a way more advanced now than it was before.

Video about my beginners tutorial at the bottom.

[size=12pt]Still to do:[/size]
[b][size=10pt]- Getting out typos

  • Make that u dont get double items
  • fix bank booths
  • make combat instructor take the bones, (just forgot it when making the video)
  • fixing banker dialogue (i used the system now that when u talk banker for the 1st time u get 2 farming,
    so if u talk the banker again u have 2 farming and he sees that u have been there already. Should need to find a better system.)
  • Fix the real cooking range @ chief[/size][/b]

Im not an advanced coder, so Im done with the tutorial after the above is fixed.

[size=10pt]Big change[/size]
I transfered the things I already did to the iskape source.
The source I was working in now was an old Delta source I found back on my computer
and it was really messy and laggy and some more crap.

What ive done more since v1.2:

  • Fixed some bugs and lil problems
  • Improved woodcutting
  • Added full cooking

  • Made a bunch of dialogues and added bunch of npcs
  • Made some shops since there was none - worthless work since I changed to the iSkape source
  • edited wrong bonus of some items - same remark as above
  • added lots of npc drops
  • fixed a few client problems

To do:
Definitely fix magic
and
Still to much to write down

Runescape Beginners Tutorial:
(my screen might have a bit an orange color, its because I use F.lux, a program that simulates the sun color on your screen of the time of the day,
and it was getting night so yah, sunset color :p)
http://vimeo.com/29582091

[size=14pt]Credits:[/size]
[size=12pt]Delta
Me
Iskape[/size]

Read full topic
